Content-Length: 766
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I know the issue of having a gladiator tournament has been discussed a 
long time ago.

Before we could even have a tournament, somebody from FSGAMES would 
have to devise a program to allow the judges of the tournament to 
check the saved games to ensure that the player visited ONLY the 
scenarios in the tournament.  I only say that to let you all know that 
having a tournament would be weeks away, at best.

The first issue of the tournament would be what scenarios to use.  
Would we want to use the the built-in scenarios or create a special 
set of scenarios to use for the tournament?  If it is the later, it 
would probably be until both Tevildo [I'm assuming you would want to 
help design those scenarios] and I have finished work on our own 
scenarios.
